Outreach to Policy Circles

2022-06-14: Bernd Skiera: Participation at the virtual event on “Whither the Regulation of Online Advertising? Debating Policy Options and Their Impact on Businesses in Europe” of Mercator Science-Policy Fellowship-Program of the Rhine-Main-Universities (with Andrea Lassmann (University of Mainz), Benjamin Mueller (Center for Data Innovation) and Gösta Petri (European Commission)

2022-06-01: Bernd Skiera: Personal meeting with Susanne Ding (Head of the Digital Infrastructure Law Unit, Federal Ministry of Transport and Digital Infrastructure), (“Leiterin Referates Recht der Digitalen Infrastruktur, Bundesministerium für Verkehr und Digitale Infrastruktur”)

2022-02-21: Bernd Skiera: Conference Call with Prof. Dr. Peter Kenning (Head of Advisory Council for Consumer Affairs) (“Sachverständigenrat für Verbraucherfragen”) to discuss insights of the book “The Impact of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) on the Online Advertising Industry”

2021-12-15: Bernd Skiera: Science-Policy Meeting with Carl Gösta Petri (Deputy Head of Unit at European Commission)

2021-11-19: Bernd Skiera: “The Impact of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) on the Different Actors in the Online Advertising Industry”, 10. Frankfurter IT-Rechtstag

2021-11-03: Bernd Skiera: Attendance of Conference of “Stiftung Datenschutz” on “DatenTag: Das TTDSG und neue Wege zur Einwilligungsverwaltung”, Berlin

2021-09-07 and subsequent days: Detailed feedback on the first draft of the book (“The Impact of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) on the Online Advertising Market”) from Filip Sedefov and Alexandre Nderagakura (Internet Advertising Bureau (IAB) Europe)

2021-08-26 and subsequent days: Detailed feedback on the first draft of the book (“The Impact of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) on the Online Advertising Market”) from Johnny Ryan (Irish Council for Civil Liberties)

2021-03-18: Lennart Kraft: “Recommender Systems in a FAIR Financial Research Data Repository” at meeting of “Fachinformationsdienstleister, Goethe-Universitätsbibliothek, Hessisches Bibliotheksinformationssystem” about the production and enrichment of research data.

2022-05-17: Lennart Kraft: Meeting of “Affiliate of Working Group on Research Data Ethics” in ständiger Ausschuss für Forschungsdateninfrastrukturen (FDI) as part of Rat für Sozial- und Wirtschaftsdaten (RatSWD)

2022-09-15: Lennart Kraft: Meeting of “Affiliate of Working Group on Research Data Ethics” in ständiger Ausschuss für Forschungsdateninfrastrukturen (FDI) as part of Rat für Sozial- und Wirtschaftsdaten (RatSWD)

2022-02-03: Lennart Kraft: Meeting of “Affiliate of Working Group on Research Data Ethics” in ständiger Ausschuss für Forschungsdateninfrastrukturen (FDI) as part of Rat für Sozial- und Wirtschaftsdaten (RatSWD)

2021-07-14: Lennart Kraft: Meeting of “Affiliate of Working Group on Research Data Ethics” in ständiger Ausschuss für Forschungsdateninfrastrukturen (FDI) as part of Rat für Sozial- und Wirtschaftsdaten (RatSWD)
